name: meetable
description: Meetable is a self-hosted event listing platform that supports IndieWeb standards. It allows managing upcoming and past events, RSVP tracking, and embeds with a responsive interface.
features: Event management: Create and publish upcoming events with dates, locations, and descriptions.
RSVP tracking: Allow attendees to RSVP and track who's coming to each event.
IndieWeb support: Implement Microformats and Webmention standards for decentralized event sharing.
Calendar integration: Export events in iCal format for import into calendar applications.
Past event archive: Maintain a searchable archive of previous events with attendance records.
Embed widgets: Generate embeddable event listings for display on external websites.
Responsive design: Display events beautifully on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
Event categories: Organize events by type, topic, or series for easier discovery.
Location mapping: Display event locations on maps with directions and venue information.
Notification system: Send reminders to attendees before events via email or RSS.
Multi-organizer support: Allow multiple users to create and manage events.
Search functionality: Find events by date, location, category, or keyword.
